title: Mardi Gras Madness
content:
![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131106093620im_/http:/typophile.com/files/P2240047_5896.jpg)
  
This is the float where the theme was "Mario Bros." They all had hats with big "M's" on their hats. They all displays the logo on their shirts

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131106093620im_/http:/typophile.com/files/P2240055_3759.JPG)
  
This is a man! Yes a man! This is a middle aged man dressed like an old woman. At first, I thought it was a woman until he started scratching his hairy legs.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131106093620im_/http:/typophile.com/files/P2240050_6603.JPG)
  
This is a float with everyone in Saints jerseys. The numbers on my home team's jersey looks like a collegiate typeface. 

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131106093620im_/http:/typophile.com/files/P2240054_5748.JPG)
  
This float was a tribute to someone who died. Everyone wore shirts with messages on it. Their shirts and the words on the float was a script typeface.
author: achristophe

comments.content:
These images are far too large to be viewed in the this context. Please upload images at an appropriate size for viewing - 600px wide maximum.

If you have any questions, feel free to e-mail me offline.  
Thanks!
